documents:
Table 'accountheads' overview:

Table 'admintables' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, user_id, settings_id, role, created_at, updated_at

Table 'attendances' overview:
- Key columns: id, settings_id

Table 'audits' overview:
- Key columns: id, settings_id
- Sample columns: id, action, description, doneby, settings_id, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: settings_id -> settings.id

Table 'failed_jobs' overview:
- Key columns: id
- Sample columns: id, uuid, connection, queue, payload, exception, failed_at

Table 'followups' overview:
- Key columns: id, settings_id

Table 'housefellowhips' overview:
- Key columns: id, settings_id
- Sample columns: id, name, location, address, leader, about, activities, settings_id, created_at, updated_at

Table 'migrations' overview:
- Key columns: id

Table 'ministries' overview:
- Key columns: id, settings_id
- Sample columns: id, name, details, leader, activities, settings_id, created_at, updated_at
- Relationships: settings_id -> settings.id

Table 'ministrygroups' overview:
- Key columns: id, user_id
- Sample columns: id, ministry_group_name, motto, logo, address, background, mode, color, user_id, created_at
- Relationships: user_id -> users.id

Table 'ministrymembers' overview:
- Key columns: id, member_id, ministry_id
- Sample columns: id, member_id, ministry_id, position, created_at, updated_at

Table 'password_resets' overview:
- Key columns: email
- Sample columns: email, token, created_at

Table 'personal_access_tokens' overview:
- Key columns: id, tokenable_type

Table 'programmes' overview:
- Key columns: id, settings_id
- Sample columns: id, title, type, from, to, details, category, picture, ministry, settings_id

Table 'reports' overview:
- Key columns: id, ministry_id

Table 'settings' overview:
- Key columns: id, ministrygroup_id, user_id
- Sample columns: id, ministry_name, motto, logo, address, background, mode, color, ministrygroup_id, user_id
- Relationships: ministrygroup_id -> ministrygroups.id; user_id -> users.id

Table 'tasks' overview:
- Key columns: id, settings_id

Table 'transactions' overview:

Table 'users' overview:
